racial_features.name: Half-Elf Tings
racial_features.description: Immune to magical sleep, advantage on saves vs. charmed.

class_features.name: Rage
class_features.description:
Rages: 4
Rage damage bonus: +3
Gain advantage on STR checks & saves, deal +5 damage on strength-based melee attacks, and resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, & slashing damage.

class_features.name: Danger Sense
class_features.description: Advantage on DEX saving throws against effects you can see.

class_features.name: Wrathful Smite
class_features.description:
3 charges per day.

The next time you hit with a melee weapon attack during this spellâ€™s duration, your attack deals an extra 1d6 psychic damage. Additionally, if the target is a creature, it must make a Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of you until the spell ends. As an action, the creature can make a Wisdom check against your spell save DC to steel its resolve and end this spell.

class_features.name: Magic Sense
class_features.description:
As an action, detect any spell or magic item within 60 ft. that isn't behind total cover. Lasts until the end of your next turn.

5 uses.

class_features.name: Wild Surge
class_features.description: When you enter a rage, roll on the wild magic table to determine the magic effect product.

class_features.name: Great Weapon Master
class_features.description:
When you score a crit with a melee weapon or reduce a creature to 0 HP with one, you can make one melee weapon attack as a bonus action.

Before you make a melee attack with a heavy weapon that you're proficient with, you can choose to take a -5 penalty to the attack roll. If the attack hits, you add +10 to the attack's damage.

class_features.name: Etc.
class_features.description:
Advantage on initiative

If you rage immediately, you can act normally instead of being surprised

Roll one additional damage die for crits

class_features.name: Sentinel
class_features.description:
Opportunity attacks reduce a creature's speed to 0

Disengaged creatures still provoke opportunity attacks

Creatures within 5 ft. making an opportunity attack provoke a reaction to melee attack.

class_features.name: Brutal Critical
class_features.description: Roll 1 additional weapon danage die when critting a melee

class_features.name: Relentless Rage
class_features.description: If you drop to 0 HP while raging and don't die outright, DC 10 CON save to drop to 1 HP instead.
